summary: An epic modification of Zackdip's Daedric Retexture for the Psiijic robes, taken to a new level with glowing runes! This mod was made specially for one of my own personal characters.
descriptionHtml:
---ATTENTION----
I am no longer supporting this mod, nor have I been for some time. If you want to fix it up or add new variations of the robe, or add it to a item compilation feel free to do so, just give me credit, along with zackdip who created the original retexture I modified to make this mod. You have my proverbial blessing.

DESCRIPTION

An epic modification of Zackdip's Daedric Retexture for the Psiijic robes, taken to a new level with glowing runes! This mod was made specially for one of my own personal characters. Randal Kryger (originally Randerzo Kreiger); The Purple Mage. I won't go into detail about him because that's not why you're here.

The robes are now for male and female.

What? Is it Standalone? Well of course it is! You want a replacer you say? Meh... FINE! The Purple one comes in a replacer version.

...What? You want the daedric one to be a replacer? No, Not right now.

HOW TO GET THE ROBES

open the console and type without the parentheses (help Krieger) and then copy the eight digit code --if there are a bunch on zeros in front you can leave those out-- to make the command (player.additem xxxxxxxx) with the code in place of the x's.

PERMISSIONS

Please do not modify my modified textures without my permission. Additionally As per Zackdip's Original permissions THIS IS AN WILL REMAIN A NEXUS EXCLUSIVE! Zack didn't want anyone uploading the stuff anywhere else. and I neither to I!

KNOWN ISSUES

The "Black Robes of Krieger may not be working properly. The other two robes in the ESP work just fine however.

ADDENDUM

This is by no means my first mod but it is the first one ever to be released in any way shape or form and not simply kept to my self.

If you don't like it, go to a different page... NOW... seriously I don't want to hear it.
If you have suggestions I may or may not take them into consideration.
Endorse if you like it!
author: Randerzo
